channel.title: Racism?
channel.description: Why is racism still out there in the world? It's disgusting. Today an african american was being bullied by two caucasian males, so I jumped in and me and the kid destroyed them. I was suspended of course. As I'm walking out of the door, the principal comes behind me and says, "Why didn't you just let the nigger get beat up?" I replied, "Fuck you." and walked out. What the fuck is going on that everyone is becoming racist? [s]Nazi-Revolution[/s]? Whatever it is, I'm gonna stop that shit, real quick & fast at my fucking school.

item.title: Racism?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

m1lkman:

Just because they signed their lives away doesn’t mean it is justified that someone can give government secrets to the enemy and then the enemy kill soldiers. That’s like saying, you’re a witness to a murder and you plan on testifying against a mob boss. You are willingly testifying and then someone comes along and leaks out your name. The mob boss finds out and kills you. You know the repercussions of testifying against a mob boss but you do it anyway because you know it is the RIGHT thing to do.

going along with your analogy if I was a witness to a murder I would be put in the witness protection program to you know, protect me before, during and after testifying

if intelligence is LEAKED TO EVERYONE, and NOT JUST TO THE ENEMY then your government and armed forces KNOW who is at risk and should take steps to protect them, if soldiers die because intelligence was released the blame doesn’t lie with just the middleman it also lies with the people that were supposed to protect those soldiers, the middleman is merely the public scapegoat

and on the topic of wikileaks, extreme care was and is being taken to protect soldiers and individuals by not releasing the names of those involved and not all the intelligence they get is released

Read full topic

item.title: Racism?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Palmiz, post:106, topic:425205”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=527868.msg3852242#msg3852242 date=1324121960]
That’s like saying, you’re a witness to a murder and you plan on testifying against a mob boss. You are willingly testifying and then someone comes along and leaks out your name. The mob boss finds out and kills you. You know the repercussions of testifying against a mob boss but you do it anyway because you know it is the RIGHT thing to do.
[/quote]
You are finally making sense.

You did mean that the witness was Bradley Manning and the Mob Boss was the US government. Right?[/quote]

No lol.

Mob Boss =Al Queda
Leaker = Wikileaks
Witness = US Troops

Read full topic

item.title: Racism?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:101, topic:425205”][quote author=Kozs link=topic=527868.msg3851595#msg3851595 date=1324069703]

[quote author=ox random xi link=topic=527868.msg3851588#msg3851588 date=1324069400]

Well I’m sure Americans would be absolutely fine with diplomacy in exchange for the death of 3,000 Americans. That would make our country look weak.

So in response, you kill hundreds of thousands of innocent people in another country? Nicccccccccccce

direct & indirect deaths: 9,415 - 29,007

The civilians should stand up and fight for their country. They should help the U.S. root out known terrorist cells. Many don’t.
[/quote]So i suppose if say, China invaded the US to root out Ku Klux Klan, and they murdered many innocent Americans in the process of finding the KKK cells, would you approve of that? If you would, at least you are being consistent, if not, you’re a hypocrite.

Has the Ku Klux Klan done anything to China. If so, the Government would hand over the perps to the chinese government. The governments in the middle East aren’t cooperating with the US
[/quote]There are many well documented cases of the US Government not giving up its citizens to other countries.

I’m sure there are exceptions. Could you post some examples?

Our government usually keeps this stuff secret, which is why the savior Wikileaks came along.

Also caused the death of US Troops. Yes, Wikileaks is our savior.

Like I give a shit about the US Troops, they signed away their life when they agreed to fight.

Omg FUCK YOU DUDE THEY FIGHT EVERYDAY FOR WHAT WE HAVE TODAY OUR LIFE STYLE WE’D be FUCKED BY CHINA BY NOW IF WE HAD NO TROOPS! Fuck you dude I hope your not fucking aMerican

They signed their life when they agreed to fight, there is no Draft. P.S. Don’t get angry, Anonymous is fighting for our rights back.[/quote]

Just because they signed their lives away doesn’t mean it is justified that someone can give government secrets to the enemy and then the enemy kill soldiers. That’s like saying, you’re a witness to a murder and you plan on testifying against a mob boss. You are willingly testifying and then someone comes along and leaks out your name. The mob boss finds out and kills you. You know the repercussions of testifying against a mob boss but you do it anyway because you know it is the RIGHT thing to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Racism?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Humans are not all the same on the inside. No one thinks alike besides possibly genetic clones or twins, the only thing people share is how our bodies work. Some people are racist to black people because of the color of their skin, it’s their choice if they wish to judge them on their looks. I don’t really care about looks, but attitude and personality. If you walk arround just swearing and saying nigger all the time, I don’t like you. Not because your black or white, but because I don’t like the way you ACT. You can’t change the way people want to think.

Read full topic

[quote author=m1lkman link=topic=527868.msg3850668#msg3850668 date=1323991347]

Well I’m sure Americans would be absolutely fine with diplomacy in exchange for the death of 3,000 Americans. That would make our country look weak.

So in response, you kill hundreds of thousands of innocent people in another country? Nicccccccccccce

direct & indirect deaths: 9,415 - 29,007

The civilians should stand up and fight for their country. They should help the U.S. root out known terrorist cells. Many don’t.
[/quote]So i suppose if say, China invaded the US to root out Ku Klux Klan, and they murdered many innocent Americans in the process of finding the KKK cells, would you approve of that? If you would, at least you are being consistent, if not, you’re a hypocrite.

Has the Ku Klux Klan done anything to China. If so, the Government would hand over the perps to the chinese government. The governments in the middle East aren’t cooperating with the US
[/quote]There are many well documented cases of the US Government not giving up its citizens to other countries.

I’m sure there are exceptions. Could you post some examples?

Our government usually keeps this stuff secret, which is why the savior Wikileaks came along.

Also caused the death of US Troops. Yes, Wikileaks is our savior.

Like I give a shit about the US Troops, they signed away their life when they agreed to fight.

Omg FUCK YOU DUDE THEY FIGHT EVERYDAY FOR WHAT WE HAVE TODAY OUR LIFE STYLE WE’D be FUCKED BY CHINA BY NOW IF WE HAD NO TROOPS! Fuck you dude I hope your not fucking aMerican[/quote]
They signed their life when they agreed to fight, there is no Draft. P.S. Don’t get angry, Anonymous is fighting for our rights back.
Hey, Mr. Kozs, did you see the new bill that just got passed? It’s the patriot act for Americans, look up NDAA. Then tell me if our country is looking out for our rights, then after you’re reading that go look up “SOPAA” and see that our Congress wants China to be the model for our privacy.
Yes, I’m sadly American, but not totally sad, I love our current president but the previous administration totally fucked the country beyond repair, also our current Congress doesn’t give two shits about the American people and only about rich people and corporations (which are now called people apparently).

item.title: Racism?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Not that simple, to expel a student, the principle must send a request down to the administrators of the school district, then they must meet and have a discussion about why the student should be expelled, the student could win that argument [student and parent or just parent]. After the discussion, they won’t give you an answer about whether or not the student is expelled for another one to three days. The principle can’t expel students for no reason whatsoever.

Read full topic

@Uncalled wrote:

Are you retarded? The principle doesn’t own the school; he has no right to say who is allowed to be enrolled and who isn’t.
